Script.name: Whitelists
Script.script: system.hunting.defs.mobWhitelist = system.hunting.defs.mobWhitelist or {}

Script.name: the Sunderlands
the frozen tundra
Script.script: system.hunting.defs.mobWhitelist["the frozen tundra"] = { "a massive wendigo", "a tundra wolf", "a woolly mammoth", "a sabre walrus", "a diamond fish", "Shmeeg, an old wendigo", "an ice bear", "a crystal spider", "an ice scarab", "an ice shard", "an ice golem", }
